pageContext.description:
The well weathered three arched stone bridge leads to the village green and meadowland besides the River Arrow.

Original watercolour, image size 10" x 5.75".

Mounted to fit frame size 16" x 12".

Price £195

The signed, embossed limited edition print, mounted to fit frame size 14"x 11"

Price £45

pageContext.metaDescription: Watercolour Painting of The Bridge over the River Arrow, Pembridge, Herefordshire. By Herefordshire artist David J. Fry.
